name: Self-Cleaning Cat Brush
imageAlt: Self-cleaning slicker brush for cats with retractable bristles and ergonomic handle
shortDescription: One-click self-cleaning brush that makes grooming effortless for you and gentle for your cat.
description: Grooming should not be a chore for you or a stress for your cat. This slicker brush glides through fur to remove tangles, loose hair, and dander with zero pulling. When you are done, press the button and the retractable bristles push collected fur right off — no picking clumps out by hand.
features: One-click retractable bristles eject collected fur instantly
Fine, rounded pins detangle without scratching skin
Ergonomic non-slip handle for comfortable extended grooming
Works on all coat types — short, medium, and long hair
Reduces shedding by up to 90% with regular use
